Class SolvedAdminRequests

java.lang.Object
application.framework.BasePage
application.pages.admin.SolvedAdminRequests
public class SolvedAdminRequests extends BasePage
Displays the list of all closed/solved admin requests and allows Instructors to reopen a closed admin request and update its description.
Author:
Tyler
